name: Empoleon
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

abilities.name: Emergency Surfacing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in your discard pile and you have no cards in your hand, you may put this Pokémon onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
